name: The Portal Guardian
description:
This top-down shooter game is about a wizard who must protect the only thing that he would die for: his portal. By using his magic staff as a weapon, you will need to kill SPOOKY enemies who were born for the only purpose of destroying this 1 portal. What lies in the portal? Is it treasure? A lost city waiting to be discovered? A cookie? Whatever it is, you must risk your own life to protect this portal. Everything in the game is made by me, including that horrible music :(. This game was made in 2 days for a game jam with the theme: magic.

You lose the game if either the player or portal is dead
